mAPSHx-y6.memHandModelNotes: Elevation minimum of 610 meters is limting model to the Appalachians and eliminating portions of the range in central TN and KY and southern IN. I altered this model to make it hand model in which elevation limitations are dropped in the western portion of the range. All other model parameters are maintained. MJR 19 March 2008.
